abstract: Excluding the impact from the sale of NBCUniversal, General Electric’s quarterly revenue also rose 4 percent, as the company increasingly returned to its industrial roots.
snippet: Excluding the impact from the sale of NBCUniversal, General Electric’s quarterly revenue also rose 4 percent, as the company increasingly returned to its industrial roots.
lead_paragraph: General Electric, with the fallout from the financial crisis receding, is finally starting to look like what it is — the nation’s largest industrial company.

headline.print_headline: G.E. Earnings Show Reason For Optimism, Chief Says

abstract: The unit, which had been a strong performer in recent quarters, reported on Friday that revenue was down 12 percent from the same period a year ago.
snippet: The unit, which had been a strong performer in recent quarters, reported on Friday that revenue was down 12 percent from the same period a year ago.
lead_paragraph: GE Capital, the finance arm of the industrial giant General Electric, continues to shrink.
